BS Company

Quality alloy car wheels
Automotive and industrial design
Job Description

BS Company is dedicated to providing quality wheels and lifestyle products for those who value excellence.

Attend

Industrial Designer at BS Company

BS Company is dedicated to providing quality wheels and lifestyle products for those who value excellence.

Our brand aims to reflect a passion for ingenuity and a desire to impact not only the automotive world, but culture at large.

At BS Company, we place a high emphasis on design. Like our customers, we value the time and work that goes into creating and manufacturing products that are innovative and aesthetically pleasing. A commitment to providing our customers with the best has positioned BS Company at the forefront of our industry. From our events to our renowned world tours, our supporters feel a sense of pride in the standards we uphold.

At BS Company, we place a high emphasis on design. Like our customers, we value the time and work that goes into creating and manufacturing products that are innovative and aesthetically pleasing. A commitment to providing our customers with the best has positioned BS Company at the forefront of our industry. Challenges

Required Skills

  • Strong Portfolio
  • 5 - 10 Years experience in car design or similar industry
  • Skilled Sketching
  • 3D Package knowledges
  • Big amount of finished works
  • Ready to Relocate
